name: The Hallways 1985
description:
Story:
The year is 1985.
You wake up on a mysterious maze, you don't know how you got there, you want to get out, but you can't, the only option is to discover the dark truth behind it.
You will go through many places that are oddly familiar, something's not right in these hallways.
Instructions:
Use the arrow keys to move.
you have to walk through the map and get to the elevator located in the end, this elevator will take you to the next floor.
Sometimes, the room with the elevator will be locked, so you'll have to look for keys to open many rooms.
In some cases, you will be chased, then you will have to run for your life, you will be safe as soon as you get to the elevator.
